name: Farming at the End of the World
name_original: Farming at the End of the World
description:
You are a farmer attempting to water their crops in the middle of the night. Defend from mutants and manage your tools to water your wheat.

Simple gameplay, find farm tools scattered around the farm house, manage your light source and go about watering your crops.

Getting attacked by an enemy will end the game.
